reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and well-made, with a sheer fabric that's airy and comfortable to wear. They appreciate its versatility, with one customer noting it's perfect for a sail-away cruise party, and consider it excellent value for money. The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits true to size, others find it too big. The color quality is also mixed, with some customers loving it while ot

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: You couldn’t tell me nothing when I put this on! Worn to family wedding and all eyes were on us! Great flowing fit so shape wear wasn’t necessary. Color was vibrant and eye catching! The fabric is a little thin so I’ll only wear in spring and summer. I’ve already ordered 3 other colors Read more
items.author: BamasFinest

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress!
items.body: The material was not cheap looking. The dress was cute. It did not flare much, but it was still a nice look. I received multiple compliments. I would recommend. DO NOT ORDER THE PURPLE! The color is bad. Black was perfect. Read more
items.author: Ms. O

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect look
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Comfortable dress, length is okay for me, no wrinkles after washing, it’s not see through , i love the color, I won’t mind buying another colour , value of money , i received a lot of compliments from people. Read more
items.author: Lily L

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible quality
items.body: Gross fabric 1000 percent thick polyester. Dress is extremely oversized. Would not order Read more
items.author: AMY

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: This is a classy dress, BUT if you’re short, you’ll definitely have to make some adjustments. That’s why I gave it 4 stars. I had to sew mine and make it work for a shorter look bc it was long to my knees,and it looks better mid thigh length like a short bubbly dress! Please go down a size. I wear an XL, and ordered a L & I’m glad I did. Perfect fit. The dress is not see through, I ordered black bc the birthday event was black attire. Definitely not a Church dress, I’d suggest a birthday dinner or date night! Read more
items.author: LaToya Dickson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bubble dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. Great fabric! Read more
items.author: Marci

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant look for a low price
items.body: Loved this dress! I wore it out for my birthday dinner with my friends. I was worried about how to get the folding wrinkles out, but I put it in the dryer for about 15 mins and hung it up. Turned out great!! I’m 5’ 3” about 150 lbs I purchased a medium. Read more
items.author: Jimia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: The material is soft, the dress is even more adorable than the picture. I ordered a small and it fits perfect. I love love it. The dress ripped down the back seam. I had bought the dress a month in advance. I was very self conscious because I literally had to wear the dress anyway. Read more
items.author: paula

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Green2, White, Purple, Yellow, Apricot, Black, Orange, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
